ZX110NC Headphones

Weight: 5.29 oz (including battery and excluding cable)

Driver Unit: 1.18 in dynamic – Dome type

Magnet: Neodymium

Impedance (Ohm): Power ON 220 ohm, OFF 45 ohm (at 1 kHz)

Diaphragm: PET

Frequency Response: 10–22,000 Hz

Sensitivities (dB/mW): 110 dB/mW – Power off, 115 dB/mW – Power on

Cord Length: 3.94 ft

Plug: L-shaped gold-plated stereo mini

Wearing Style: Headband, On-ear

Price: $39.99
